title: Ep. 800 - When The COVID Cops Come Knockin’
description:
The White House plans to go door-to-door to get people jabbed with the vaccine, crime spikes in San Francisco and Chicago, and a new study shows Democrats are more likely to dehumanize Republicans.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
